add_comment.description: Add a comment to any Notion page to start discussions, provide feedback, or leave notes for team collaboration.

props.name: comment_text
props.description: Enter your comment text. Supports plain text and will be posted as a new comment thread on the selected page.

append_to_page.description: Appends content to the end of a page.

props.name: content
props.description: The content you want to append. You can use markdown formatting.

archive_database_item.description: Archive (soft-delete) a database item without permanently removing it. Archived items can be restored later if needed.

create_database_item.description: Add a new item to a Notion database with custom field values and optional content. Ideal for creating tasks, records, or entries in structured databases.

props.name: content
props.description: The content you want to append to your item.

createPage.description: Create a new Notion page as a sub-page with custom title and content. Perfect for organizing documentation, notes, or creating structured page hierarchies.

notion-find-database-item.description: Searches for an item in database by field.

find_page.description: Search for Notion pages by title with flexible matching options. Perfect for finding specific pages, building page references, or creating automated workflows based on page discovery.

props.name: title
props.description: Enter the page title or part of the title you want to search for

props.name: exact_match
props.description: Enable this to find pages with exactly the same title. Disable for partial matching (finds pages containing your search term).

props.name: limit
props.description: How many pages to return at most (between 1 and 100)

get_page_comments.description: Retrieve all comments from a Notion page, organized by discussion threads. Perfect for tracking feedback, managing reviews, or monitoring page discussions.

getPageOrBlockChildren.description: Retrieve the actual content of a page (represented by blocks).

props.name: markdown
props.description: Convert Notion JSON blocks to Markdown

props.name: dynamic
props.description: Recursively retrieve children up to this depth

props.name: depth
props.description: Recursively retrieve children up to this depth

restore_database_item.description: Restore an archived database item back to active status. Perfect for recovering accidentally archived tasks, projects, or records.

retrieve_database.description: Get detailed information about a Notion database including all its properties, field types, and configuration. Perfect for building dynamic forms, validation rules, or understanding database schemas.

update_database_item.description: Update specific fields in a Notion database item. Perfect for maintaining data, tracking changes, or syncing information across systems.

new_comment.description: Triggers whenever someone adds a new comment to a specific Notion page. Perfect for notifications, review workflows, or automated responses to team feedback.

new_database_item.description: Triggers when an item is added to a database.

updated_database_item.description: Triggers when an item is updated in a database.

updated_page.description: Triggers whenever any page in your Notion workspace is modified or updated. Ideal for syncing content changes, backup processes, or notifying teams about documentation updates.
